definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: Create a culture based on innovation and cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 建立以“勇于创新，精诚合作”为基础的企业文化。

sentences.english: We look forward to your sincere cooperation for a better future.
sentences.chinese: 我们期待与您精诚合作，共创美好的未来。

sentences.english: We are willing to cooperate with both new and old customers to create a beautiful tomorrow in common!
sentences.chinese: 愿与新老客户精诚合作，为开创碧水蓝天共同努力。

sentences.english: We've also re-engaged the United Nations.
sentences.chinese: 我们也重新跟联合国精诚合作。

sentences.english: "Good faith due to open stone", which is a great talk about the role of honest.
sentences.chinese: “精诚所致，金石为开”，这是讲诚实的巨大的作用。

sentences.english: Our company of one mind, sincerity cooperates to promote Huisheng.
sentences.chinese: 公司同仁上下一心，精诚合作，振兴惠胜。

sentences.english: Zhejiang Jingcheng Mold Machinery Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 浙江精诚模具机械有限公司。

sentences.english: No difficulty is insurmountable if one sets one's mind on it.
At the same time is willing to sincerely cooperate with you Tongren, create glory.
sentences.chinese: 同时愿与各位同仁精诚合作，共铸辉煌。

sentences.english: The question is whether leaders can cooperate in steering these changes.
sentences.chinese: 现在的问题是，各国领导人能否精诚合作，迎接挑战。

sentences.english: Let us sincere cooperation and common development and create brilliant tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 让我们精诚合作，共同发展创造辉煌的明天。

sentences.english: Sincere cooperation, win-win development, Chi Chong Albert" development purposes."
sentences.chinese: “精诚合作，共赢发展，志创伟业”的发展宗旨。

sentences.english: Renhe good faith silk screen material sales co. ltd.
sentences.chinese: 仁和精诚丝网材料销售有限公司。

sentences.english: Secondly, effective partnerships of the managements of VU and Liaoning University.
sentences.chinese: 第二，取决于辽大和维大两校管理层的精诚合作。

sentences.english: Put the two together, and you have a great combination.
sentences.chinese: 如果这两家公司能精诚合作，那会是一个极佳的组合。

sentences.english: Getting a supplies flight for our ice-measuring expedition in the Arctic is a serious collaborative effort.
sentences.chinese: 在北极，探险队获得一次空运补给是精诚合作的结果。

definition: to carry out (obligation) conscientiously/to behave sincerely
